    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddColumnCommand
    Command that adds column to a table.
    AddColumnTest
     
    AddRowCommand
    Command that adds row to a table.
    AddRowTest
     
    App
    Entry point for the application.
    AppController
    AppController is the central coordinator of the application.
    BooleanCell
    Type of cell to display boolean values
    BooleanCellTest
     
    BooleanColumn
    Represents a column that stores Boolean values.
    CanvasWindow
     
    Cell
    abstract to represent a cell in UI, contains a Rectangle
    CellTest
     
    ChangeColumnTypeCommand
    Command that changes type of column.
    ChangeDefaultValueCommand
    Command that changes default value of Column.
    Column<T>
    Represents a column in a table.
    ColumnFactory
    Factory class for creating different types of columns based on the specified ColumnType.
    ColumnType
    Enum representing the different types of columns that can exist in a table.
    ColumnTypesTest
     
    ColumnUnitTests
    Unit tests for core model classes in Tablr.
    Command
    Represents undoable command.
    CommandManager
    Manages execution of commands and undo/redo functionality.
    Controller
    Abstract base class for controllers that manage tables and their components.
    CreateTableCommand
    Command that creates a new table.
    CreateTableTest
     
    DeleteColumnCommand
    Command that deletes a column.
    DeleteColumnTest
     
    DeleteRowCommand
    Command that deletes a row in a table.
    DeleteRowTest
     
    DeleteTableCommand
    Command that deletes a table.
    DeleteTableTest
     
    DesignSubwindow
    Represents a subwindow for designing a table structure.
    EditColumnTest
     
    EditRowValueTest
     
    EditTableNameTest
     
    EmailColumn
    Represents a column that stores email addresses.
    FormSubwindow
    Represents a subwindow for editing a specific row in a table.
    FormSubwindowUseCasesTest
    Use Case Tests for FormSubwindow
    IntegerColumn
    Represents a column that stores Integer values.
    NormalCell
    type of cell to display strings, can store a temporary value while editing the cell
    NormalCellTest
     
    OpenTableTest
     
    RedoTest
     
    RenameColumnCommand
    Command that renames a column.
    RenameTableCommand
    Command that renames a table.
    RowsSubwindow
    Represents a subwindow for managing rows in a table.
    SetCellValueCommand
    Command to set a value to a cell in a table.
    StringColumn
    Represents a column that stores String values.
    Subwindow
    Represents an abstract subwindow in the application.
    SubwindowController
    Manages the lifecycle and behavior of subwindows in the application.
    Table
    Represents a table in the application, contains multiple columns and rows.
    TableArea
    Class to represent any type of Mode table in UI consisting of Cells
    TableAreaDrawer
    Utility class for rendering a TableArea and its cells.
    TableAreaDrawerTest
     
    TableAreaGenerator
     
    TableAreaGeneratorTest
     
    TableAreaTest
     
    TableController
    Manages tables by allowing creation, deletion, retrieval, and renaming.
    TablesSubwindow
    Represents a subwindow for managing and displaying tables.
    TableTest
    Unit tests for the Table class, providing full coverage of its behavior including: creation, column/row management, value setting, cloning, and exception handling.
    ToggleAllowsBlankCommand
    Command that toggles allowsBlank attribute of column.
    UIController
    The UIController class is responsible for handling user input and rendering the UI.
    UndoRedoTest
     
    UndoTest
     
    UnitTests
    Unit tests for Tablr use cases, covering both valid and invalid scenarios.
